Silent Payments notifications via Nostr wg-silent-payments
This write-up has the goal to discuss the approach of sending notifications for incoming Silent Payments transactions via Nostr. The design is an extension of the discussions around “Stealth addresses using nostr” which had a Nostr-only approach. The design allows for notifications being sent outside of Nostr so for a clearer structure there is a Silent Payments and a Nostr part.
